body.name: Ultra Performance 3 Pack Athletic Tech Mens Joggers, Track Sweatpants for Men with Zipper Pockets

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Black Tricot Trainer Pant With Piping and Stripe

features: Men's Joggers: If you are looking for high-quality lightweight men's jogger workout sweatpants then look no further. We're proud to offer durable workout clothes for men.
Mens Active Tech Joggers Material: High-quality Tricot mens athletic pants make for the ideal workout pants for men.

Men's Jogger Sweatpants with Zipper Pocket: Our activewear tech joggers for men 3 pack come in a variety of styles and colors they can also be paired with a base layer or cold weather gear for year-round training.
Mens Joggers Slim Fit Sizes: Our mens joggers sweatpants with pockets come in the following sizes; Small, Medium, Large, X-large, and 2X.
Satisfaction Guaranteed: Based on the confidence in quality, our sweatpants for men 3 pack is protected by worry-free support. Customer satisfaction is our top priority.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for money
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my husband and he loves them. They’re not too thin that they aren’t warm but they’re lightweight. Deep pockets. Possibly runs a little big.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality. Returned for refund.
reviews.reviewText: I should have read the reviews before purchasing. Gave them 5 stars for light weight because they are paper thin. If you like being an exhibitionist these might be up your alley. The colors are so garish I wouldn’t dare be seen wearing them in public. Poor workmanship. On one pair the left pocket seam was not sewn shut making that pocket useless. I purchased a size larger than what I normally wear expecting shrinkage but these went right back in the bag for return so am not sure what would happen if I washed them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought a large thinking it would fit they were too small. Had to go to an XL and they fit but still a little snug around the calf’s. These were meant for a person with skinny legs not someone who works out. Especially if you want full movement in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are very light weight and comfortable. Great lounge alternative for shorts in the summer.Durability is questionable. Almost immediately had to sew the pockets because the thread broke or came loose at the bottom of the pockets in all but one pair but other than that they were great my boy friend loved them and wears them all the time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice colors/ very thin
reviews.reviewText: If a very thin jogger is what you want, this is it. They look nice, but are very thin. Just feels like very cheap material. Will not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: We'll start with the good. These joggers feel very nice next to the skin. They fit snug, but not too tight. They are lightweight & surprisingly warm. If I had written this review after wearing them once, I'd have given them 5 stars. But then I washed them ...When they came out of the wash, there were so many loose threads I had to start cutting thru them with scissors. I thought I had gotten all of them, but every time I put my hands in the pocket or adjusted the drawstring I found more. They still fit wonderfully, but now I am worrying they will fall apart after 3-4 washes !Bottom line is, I do like them. Very much. I am just concerned about their durability. I will post an update in a couple of months ... if they last that long !UPDATE: So of the 3 pairs, one is in perfect shape, one has a hole in one pocket & the crotch, and the last one has lost more than HALF the stitching that hold the waist band & drawstring. So I can wear ONE of them out in public, the other two are just for lounging at home ... and that may come to end in a moth or so the way things are going. It is a shame because I really DID like these the first time I wore them. But the QC issues are too much. Would not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandson likes these
reviews.reviewText: Like that they are thin, not big, thick and heavy like others, also liked the zippered pockets. And of course the super fast delivery.Works well for those with sensory issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disintegrating and Awful
reviews.reviewText: I've only had these for a few months, and have probably only washed each sub ten times. That being said, they're falling apart rapidly. Each wash, including the very first one, pulls multiple threads from them. I've washed them as softly as I can, following the instructions as best I can. It doesn't help.Every wash is more and more strings I'm having to trim from the pants. I doubt I'll even have viable pants to wear within another month or so. Do not purchase, they're a waste of time and money.
The large size is not the usual because it is too small. The men large size is not cut so slender. I have to give them away.
Los pants no son como los describen, indican bolsas con cierre y no es así, pero lo más importante es que viene muy reducido, solicite talla 2XL y a pesar de venir así marcado es como talla L

Pedi talla XL supuestamente porque eran talla 34.5 y resultaron ser como talla 3xL pero estan padres y delgaditos los mandaré a cocer para reducirlos ya que el diseño está padre y ya compre camisas para esos pants
La descripción dice pants y llegaron blusas sin mangas.... Son cómodas y útiles pero no es lo que dice ni la foto ni la descripción.... Talvez puedan ajustar eso
